name: superbrain
description: Superbrain is your personal **second brain** â€” a minimal, secure web app built with the **MERN stack** that helps you **store, organize, and revisit** links to online content such as **tweets, YouTube videos, blogs**, and more.

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd frontend && npm ci --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run start:server & npm run start:client
